question: TK1.5 Critically evaluate methods for addressing challenges within a project environment

- reactive: spelling out the issue with the (1 or +) parties. Set clear expectation, draw on different leadership styles depending on knowledge of the challenged/ing partie/s. firmness&empathy
- levels of problem: from mild annoyance to illegal behaviour. Some things to report immediately and not PM job to resolve.
- collaboration with all/any relevant parties rather than
- realise limitations of conflict resolution at local level - escalate through management or HR.
- Stress - Yerkes Dobson law: humans perform best halfway between sleep state and total panic. Monitor levels in team particularly on intense projects.
